MiniOaoSettings.description: Settings for Mini Online Account Opening

minVersion.description: Minimum version required for Mini OAO

shouldShowJointOwners.description: If true, show the 'add joint owners' view in the new account opening wizard

addNewJointOwnerEnabled.description: If true, allow the creation of a new Joint Owner

shouldSelectAllJointAccountsByDefaultOnN.description: If true, pre-check all Joint Owners during the new account creation process

allowCreateNewJointOwnerDuringAccountCre.description: If true, allow the ability to create a new Joint-Owner during the account creation process

allowNewAccountFunding.description: If true, allow the ability to fund a new account during the account creation process

shouldWarnUserIfNoDebitCardSelected.description: If true, warn the user that they have not selected any debit cards for any of the Joint-Owners

promoCodesEnabled.description: If true, enable the use of Promo Codes during the new account creation process

forceNewAccountOpeningDisclosure.description: If true, the user must accept a disclosure when creating a new Account

forceAddNewJointOwnerDisclosure.description: If true, the user must accept a disclosure when creating a new Joint Owner

shouldUseMockData.description: If true, will use Mock Data instead of reaching out to OAO

canFundFromCrossAccount.description: If true, will return Cross accounts when retrieving FundingAccounts

requireIdInfoOnAddJointOwner.description: If true, require ID info to be filled out on the 'add joint owner' form

requireEmployerInfoOnAddJointOwner.description: If true, require employer info to be filled out on the 'add joint owner' form
